metadata.name: HYPERCOLOR
metadata.description:
Inspired by the idea of light above the visible spectrum, HYPERCOLOR utilizes alternating colors as a tool to reshape and redefine color. Continuing JIMMY’s explorations into programmable artwork, the images create the illusion of light as a digital material.

Blocks of vibrating light are projected onto a 2D canvas, creating composed geometries and divisions that bounce from side to side. The work’s behavior has a scanning quality, fluctuating between states in which the beams glide calmly, pulsing and with energetic movement.
